original: Björkman, Halvor Nils Henrik, hemmansägare, Bråta, Borensberg, f. 25/ 12/88 i Rappestad, östergötl. 1., av Nils B. o. Henny CorneHus. G. 18 m. Astrid Simonsson. Barn: Nils f. 19, Bernt 21, Jan 25. — Stud:ex. 07, fil. kand. 13, fil. mag. 14. Landstingsman 30-46, led. av landstingets ddstr :vårds-styr. sed. 36, suppl. i förvaltn :utsk. o. led. av direkt, f. länslas., led. av styr. f. Allm. valmiförb, f. Östergötl., rev. i RLF östgötaavd., ordf. i Bobergs högerfören.
translated: Björkman, Halvor Nils Henrik, homesteader, Bråta, Borensberg, born on December 25th, 1888 in Rappestad, Östergötland, son of Nils B. and Henny CorneHus. Married in 1918 to Astrid Simonsson. Children: Nils born in 1919, Bernt in 1921, Jan in 1925. He graduated high school in 1907, Bachelor of Arts in 1913, and Master of Arts in 1914. He was a member of the county council from 1930 to 1946, a member of the council's healthcare committee since 1936, a substitute in the management committee, and a member of the board of directors of the county insurance company. He was a member of the board of directors for the General Election Association of Östergötland, auditor in the Swedish Farmers Association's Östergötland branch, and chairman of the Boberg's Right Association.
